casebody.data:
Lillian Phelps KELLEY, Russel P. Kelley, Phelps Kelley, and Gordon P. Kelley, Co-executors of the Last Will and Testament of William V. Kelley, Deceased, and Krem-Ko Company, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. HEYMAN PROCESS CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. No. 329. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 19, 1934. George I. Haight and M. K. Hobbs, both of Chicago, Ill. (Usina & Rauber, of New York City, of counsel),, for appellants. Charles H. Wilson, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (3 F. Supp. 362) affirmed, on opinion below.
